sentence: Another no-show will be state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who’s expected to be the Democratic nominee in the state gubernatorial race.
author: Michael Dorstewitz
title: Dems Now Avoid Their Biggest Liability — Joe Biden

sentence: John Fetterman, a leading Senate candidate, and state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the likely Democratic nominee in the race for governor, will be absent because of scheduling conflicts, according to their spokespeople.
author: Women System
title: Democrats Are Already Making Excuses To Not Appear In Public With Joe Biden

sentence: Several high-profile Democratic candidates have already skipped out on appearing with Biden, including Georgia gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams and Pennsylvania Democrats John Fetterman and Josh Shapiro.

title: Democrat Candidate for Texas Governor Beto O’Rourke ‘Not Interested’ In Help From Joe Biden

sentence: Democratic incumbent governors are running for reelection in all of those states, other than the key battleground of Pennsylvania, where the party seems to be coalescing around state Attorney General Josh Shapiro in the race to succeed term-limited Gov.
